item.title: Trump’s federal law-enforcement crackdown ripples through DC neighborhoods
item.description: President Donald Trump’s decision to increase federal law enforcement and immigration agents in Washington, D.C., has impacted neighborhoods like Columbia Heights.

item.title: Trump’s Justice Department is investigating whether DC police officials falsified crime data
Hurricane Erin forecast to churn up dangerous swells and winds from Florida to New England
